sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent { recipes: Recipe[] = [ new Recipe( 'Cajun Turkey Burger', 'Cajun cheeseburger with made with a special cajun seasoning topped with a a special spicy mayo with a toasted bun', 'https://divascancook.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Still-1-728x430.jpeg'), new Recipe('Homemade Dinner Yeast Rolls', 'Pillowy-soft homeade yeast rolls that are so easy to make! Buttery with only a hing of sweetness makes these the perfect dinner rolls for any occasion',"https://divascancook.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/IMG_4575-728x546.jpg"), new Recipe('Spicy Crispy Fried Chicken','Crispy spicy fried chicken recipe thats full of cajun flavor and seasoned to perfection. A buttermilk brine ensures a juicy, tender piece of fried chicken everytime','https://divascancook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/IMG_0231-750x469.jpg') ] }
